sourcesContent:
import { Container } from "./styles"; import VinayakSingh from "../../assets/Adarsh.png"; import wordpress from "../../assets/github.svg"; import shopify from "../../assets/mongo.svg"; import htmlIcon from "../../assets/html-icon.svg"; import cssIcon from "../../assets/css-icon.svg"; import jsIcon from "../../assets/js-icon.svg"; import nodeIcon from "../../assets/node-icon.svg"; import reactIcon from "../../assets/react-icon.svg"; import typescriptIcon from "../../assets/mysql-icon.svg"; import vueIcon from "../../assets/vue-icon.svg"; import boostrapIcon from "../../assets/bootstrap-icon.svg"; import ScrollAnimation from "react-animate-on-scroll"; export function About() { return (

About me

Hi there! I'm Adarsh, a DevOps engineer With a skill set including HTML, CSS, JavaScript,React,AWS Services,GitLab,Python and Jenkis. I have the tools to bring any website vision to real world.

But my services go beyond just custom development - I'm also proficient in using CMS systems and tools like Ansible,github,MongoDB and SQL , making it easy for the user to take control of their own websites and keep them up to date.

 {/*

So if you're in need of a new website or just looking to revamp your current online presence, I'd love to chat and see how I can help. Let's bring your website dreams to reality together!

*/}

Here are my main skills:
) }
